question: After a long week, what makes you feel most appreciated?

choices.A: Spending a whole day doing activities together (Quality Time)
choices.B: A warm hug from a loved one (Physical Touch)
choices.C: Hearing your partner say they are proud of you (Words of Affirmation)
choices.D: When someone helps you with errands (Acts of Service)
choices.E: Receiving a surprise gift, like a book you really wanted (Receiving Gifts)

question: When you’re feeling down, what lifts your spirits?

choices.A: A thoughtful text from a loved one (Words of Affirmation)
choices.B: An unexpected gift, like flowers (Receiving Gifts)
choices.C: Having someone listen to you while you vent (Acts of Service)
choices.D: A comforting hug (Physical Touch)
choices.E: A friend stopping by for a quick chat (Quality Time)

question: In a relationship, how do you like to express love?

choices.A: Buying them their favorite treat (Receiving Gifts)
choices.C: Giving them a massage after a long day (Physical Touch)
choices.D: Doing chores for them without being asked (Acts of Service)
choices.E: Writing little notes for them to find (Words of Affirmation)

question: What makes you feel most special on your birthday?

choices.A: A heartfelt card expressing love (Words of Affirmation)
choices.B: A long, warm hug from someone you love (Physical Touch)
choices.C: Quality time spent with close friends (Quality Time)
choices.D: A day where your partner does everything for you (Acts of Service)
choices.E: A surprise party planned just for you (Receiving Gifts)

question: How do you feel loved during a tough day?

choices.A: A surprise coffee delivered to you (Acts of Service)
choices.B: A supportive message from a loved one (Words of Affirmation)
choices.C: An evening spent watching your favorite show together (Quality Time)
choices.D: A comforting hug when you get home (Physical Touch)
choices.E: A small gift that shows they care (Receiving Gifts)

question: During family gatherings, what makes you feel most connected?

choices.A: Receiving a gift from a relative (Receiving Gifts)
choices.C: Helping prepare the meal together (Acts of Service)
choices.D: Sharing stories and laughter together (Quality Time)
choices.E: Compliments from family members (Words of Affirmation)

question: What action from your partner would make you feel the most cherished?

choices.A: Holding hands while watching a movie (Physical Touch)
choices.B: Spending an entire weekend together (Quality Time)
choices.C: A heartfelt conversation about your future (Words of Affirmation)
choices.D: Surprising you with a thoughtful gift (Receiving Gifts)
choices.E: Cooking your favorite meal for you (Acts of Service)

question: How do you prefer to celebrate your achievements?

choices.A: Going out for a nice dinner with loved ones (Quality Time)
choices.C: A congratulatory hug from a close friend (Physical Touch)
choices.D: Hearing words of praise from friends (Words of Affirmation)
choices.E: Having someone help plan the celebration (Acts of Service)

question: What makes you feel appreciated at work?

choices.A: A shout-out in a team meeting (Words of Affirmation)
choices.B: Receiving a small gift for your hard work (Receiving Gifts)
choices.C: Help with a big project (Acts of Service)
choices.D: A pat on the back or a hug from a coworker (Physical Touch)
choices.E: Spending time with colleagues during breaks (Quality Time)

choices.A: A comforting hug (Physical Touch)

choices.C: Encouraging words from loved ones (Words of Affirmation)
choices.D: Having someone help with your tasks (Acts of Service)

choices.A: A surprise gift that shows they know you (Receiving Gifts)
choices.C: Cuddling during a movie (Physical Touch)
choices.D: Your partner taking care of all the planning (Acts of Service)
